title: CTA
description: A call-to-action section for driving user conversions with headlines and action buttons.

examples.code:
<CTA
  variant="gradient"
  headline="Ready to get started?"
  description="Join thousands of teams already using our platform"
  primaryAction={<Button>Start Free Trial</Button>}
  secondaryAction={<Button variant="secondary">Learn More</Button>}
/>

<CTA
  variant="banner"
  size="sm"
  headline="Get 20% off with code LAUNCH"
  primaryAction={<Button size="sm">Shop Now</Button>}
/>
